title: if u are film-pro u have to catch this idea from this movie !!!!
review: İf u were because u couldn't catch that idea i can see that clearly from your point now read it and remember Who honors those we love with very life we live ? Who sends monsters to kill us... ...and at the same time sings that we'll never die ? Who teaches us whats real and how to laugh at lies ? Who decides why we live and what we'll die to defend ? Who chains us ? And who holds the key that can set us free ? İts You. you have all the weapons you need. Now Fight.... can u understand know ? u should watch movies carefully and relate them with a real life when u are able to do that u can criticized the movies
